start_message: Welcome to the anonymous chat bot! Use /next to find a chat partner.
partner_connected: You have been connected to a chat partner. Start chatting!
stop_message: Chat stopped. Use /next to find a new partner.
partner_stop_message: Your partner has stopped the chat.
no_chat_message: You are not in a chat. Use /next to find a partner.
help_message:
Here are some available commands:
/start - Start the bot
/next - Find a chat partner
/stop - Stop the chat
/help - Show help message
error_message: An error occurred. Please try again.
block_message: Your partner has blocked you or deleted their account.
